SBCOLED01.oledDrawCircle|block: draw circle at x: %x and y: %y with radius: %radius on OLED display
SBCOLED01.oledDrawLine|block: draw line from x: %x0 and y: %y0 to x: %x1 and y: %y1 on OLED display
SBCOLED01.oledDrawRectangle|block: draw rectangle at x: %x0 and y: %y0 with width: %width and height: %height on OLED display
